title: Trump's Plan to Stop the War in Ukraine
summary: President Donald Trump has a plan to end the war between Russia and Ukraine, but he says it is not his final offer. This means he might change it. Leaders from countries like Canada, Japan, and many in Europe think the plan has good parts but needs more work. They are worried about changing Ukraine's borders and limiting its army. On Sunday, officials from the US, UK, France, Germany, and Ukraine will meet in Geneva to talk about the plan. Ukraine's President Zelensky says this is a very hard time because the US is pushing Ukraine to accept a plan that might help Russia. Trump has given Ukraine until November 27 to decide. The goal is to stop the fighting and bring peace.

background_read: The war between Russia and Ukraine started when Russia invaded Ukraine. Many countries are helping Ukraine, but they want to find a way to stop the fighting. Peace plans are ideas to make both sides agree to end the war. Sometimes, leaders meet to talk and make decisions together.
Article_Structure: WHO: Donald Trump, Volodymyr Zelensky, and leaders from countries like Canada and Japan
WHAT: A plan to end the war in Ukraine that is not final and needs more work
WHERE: Geneva, Switzerland, and the G20 summit in South Africa
WHY: To stop the war and bring peace, but there are concerns about fairness

perspectives.description: He wants to end the war quickly and might change the plan
They think the plan has good parts but worry it could hurt Ukraine
